name: Understable
description:
Made for Ludum Dare 49. Theme was Unstable.

Short game about relationships, life and stability.

Arrows or A & D for moving. W, Up or Space for jumping. R to restart level. F to stop HP drain (Can help on some levels, required on 2 of them).

Programming by Vadim Shved a.k.a. vidim888

Art and music by Aleksandra Zaidelson a.k.a. Hori

LD49 link: https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/49/understable
